search

public java.util.List<Invoice> search(InvoiceQuery query)
Description copied from interface: InvoiceDAO
Searches for invoices accordingly the parameters provided by queryParameters, ordering results by date descending. The direction and owner / relatedOwner parameters can only be used together If no invoice can be found, returns an empty List. Any exception thrown by the underlying implementation should be wrapped by a DaoException.

Specified by:
search in interface InvoiceDAO
